class lettings.models.Address(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

A class to represent an address.

number¶

Number where is the letting

Type:

int

street¶

Street where is the letting

Type:

str

city¶

City where is the letting

Type:

str

state¶

State where is the letting like GA for Georgia

Type:

str

zip_code¶

Zipcode where is the letting

Type:

int

country_iso_code¶

Country ISO code where is the letting like USA

Type:

str

__str__()[source]¶

display number and street when str() is called

Parameters:

  • id (BigAutoField) – Primary key: ID

  • number (PositiveIntegerField) – Number

  • city (CharField) – City

  • state (CharField) – State

  • zip_code (PositiveIntegerField) – Zip code

  • country_iso_code (CharField) – Country iso code

Reverse relationships:

Parameters:
